Package: org.codehaus.groovy.tools.javac

[Java] Class JavaAwareCompilationUnit

        • org.codehaus.groovy.tools.javac.JavaAwareCompilationUnit

        • Compilation Unit capable of compiling Java source files.

          Authors:
          Alex.Tkachman
